TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_lalang, title = lalang, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/lalang} }

S.FORM: aicu a paiwan zuku na penakisumalji a kinanguaq na kinacalisianan a lalang, saka makaya itjen a kemasi tua rinavan nua macidjilj, a kemeljan tu namatjainu a qiniladjan nimadju yi qinaljan, tuki mamazangiljan tuki pualju tuki taqaljaqaljan (qaqetitan). aicu a pinuitaivangan a tapuluq katu unem a zukuan a kacalisian, tjaljanguanguaqan, ljakua tjaljapazangalan a kakavelian na paiwan zuku a lalang. au aicu a lalang nua mamazangiljan maretimalji katua na taqaljaqaljan (qaqetitan). izua masan simatjelj a lalang nua paiwan zuku aicu a kinacalisianan a lalang nua paiwan zuku, izua tjinenun, izua vincikan, izua pinuluvucan, izua pinadjekecan a sikasengsengan. vecik yitua lalang aicu a kinacalisianan a lalang na paiwuan zuku maretjimaljimalji a vecik, izua pinaru-qulu, izua pinaru-caucau, izua pinaru-qatjuvi, izua pinaru-kumas, izua pinaru-qadav, izua pinaru-tjiumaq, izua pinaru-kinavatjesan, izua pinaru-kalabiabi.

aico a paiwan zoko na penakisomalji a kinangoaq na kinacalisianan a lalang, saka makaya itjen a kemasi toa rinavan noa macidjilj, a kemeljan to namatjaino a qiniladjan nimadjo yi qinaljan, toki mamazangiljan toki poaljo toki taqaljaqaljan (qaqetitan). aico a pinoitaivangan a tapoloq kato onem a zokoan a kacalisian, tjaljangoangoaqan, ljakoa tjaljapazangalan a kakavelian na paiwan zoko a lalang. ao aico a lalang noa mamazangiljan maretimalji katoa na taqaljaqaljan (qaqetitan). izoa masan simatjelj a lalang noa paiwan zoko aico a kinacalisianan a lalang noa paiwan zoko, izoa tjinenon, izoa vincikan, izoa pinolovocan, izoa pinadjekecan a sikasengsengan. vecik yitoa lalang aico a kinacalisianan a lalang na paiwoan zoko maretjimaljimalji a vecik, izoa pinaro-qolo, izoa pinaro-caocao, izoa pinaro-qatjovi, izoa pinaro-komas, izoa pinaro-qadav, izoa pinaro-tjiomaq, izoa pinaro-kinavatjesan, izoa pinaro-kalabiabi.
